name: Res Cogitans
description:
Res Cogitans is a top-down 2D puzzle/game. Enjoy our retro visuals and use the power of your soul to help you body to overcome puzzles, obstacles and enemies.

Move the body with WASD; move the soul with the mouse.
Game made for GGJ 2022

You can find the source code at: https://github.com/Monkuality-GGJ22/Res-cogitans
